website_summaries.verdict: A reliable high-pressure hose that doesn't mark pavement or cement.
pros: A 100', 3/8" pressure washer hose for gas pressure washers
Many customers reported using this hose for several years without issue
cons: The stiffness of this hose makes it difficult to coil

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 years moderate use
customer_reviews.text: Lasted two years before it blew out (I use these hoses half the year about 10 hrs a week, cold water at 4000PSI max). The ends of the hose (about 3 feet from the ends) started turning black within a month of use and they spewed out some black substance that stained my shirt. After that mess they worked fine until it burst while I was using it yesterday. Seemed like a decent value at $89 for 100feet and two years use. I have a 50 footer, just waiting for it to fail at this point too. I store the hoses coiled up, drained, and indoors, so not sure how to make them last longer.
customer_reviews.author: mabl

customer_reviews.title: After a year or so this hose has held up ...
customer_reviews.text: After a year or so this hose has held up well. It is however very stiff and hard to coil up. We have ours on a reel which makes it a little easier. Update: This hose is very hard to wind up neatly. It is still very stiff. Even after 1 1/2 years of use, it still has not softened up. Once you do have it wound, its like a spring and wants to expand.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: The 100’ Simpson Monster 3/8” Hose just wasn’t gonna fit on my New Reel, So I took the garden hose off the reel , and I put 150 feet of the monster hose onto it.. Works Good so far
customer_reviews.author: Doug Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: iy get used almost every day(4 to 12 hrs)this is THE best hose I've bought
customer_reviews.text: We have had this hose for over a year at my company.iy get used almost every day(4 to 12 hrs)this is THE best hose I've bought. The only thing I've had to fix is fittings or o-rings,which I have to do on all hoses during the course of using them. This hose has not blown not 1 time in the year. Yes it is stiffer than the other hoses I've bought. O-rings,couplers,and plugs can be found at most hardware and home improvement stores. Also to mend a blown hose your nearest parker store will do that,they have fitting and hose ends also
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Skare Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Durable hose at great price
customer_reviews.text: This hose is extremely durable with a metal reinforcement. The best improvement over the last generation of its hose is that the the male and female ends can be replaced. The older hoses had one piece ends and it the fitting was damaged the board could not be repaired. The price was the lowest of any retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne J. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Lowe's has the 50 footer for 89$ . I didn't have to leave the couch got fifty more feet and saved money. I'm loving life👍
customer_reviews.author: Armando Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty pressure washer hose.
customer_reviews.text: This hose appears to be super durable, and with the braided steel and clear rubberized construction, I'm not concerned about rupture. Gives me the length I need, it's a very stiff hose, hopefully some of that will go away with time, but the primary reason for the 4-star review was because before I could even use it I had to replace the o-ring in the female quick connect.
customer_reviews.author: williamsr81

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I added this hose to my existing 25' hose and was able to wash my house without moving the pressure washer. The hose is slightly on the stiff side like some of the other reviews said but if you keep using your existing hose hooked to your wand and use this hose as an extension it works fantastic. The hose seems to be built very well. The quick connects are brass and do not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Newman

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty hose
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the 50 hose that came with my pressure washer would not reach to my third floor porch. So, I bought the 100 ft. It will come in handy when I do the roof. The hose is super heavy duty and has quick connect connectors. I spent most of my time fighting the stiff hose, but will probably soften over time.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Lang

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hoping it would last and handle my Simpson 4400psi 4.4gpm machine but it could not. I had an extra 50ft of this same hose connected to this (now 200ft total), the one that came with my PowerShot and I started to notice what looked like rust between the sheath covering and the wire braiding after about 3-4 months. I thought nothing of it. Yesterday I was constantly sprayed in the face by a pinhole when reeling it in. Today, that same area is splayed open like a dissected frog with the wire braid exposed. Now, I'm just hoping it lasts the week. I'm a professional exterior cleaner so it does get used quite a bit but still.....
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Naif

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent high quality hose
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent high quality hose. The clear sleeve on it makes in non marking. ( No black scrape marks on your driveway.) The longer reach is a great help. The length will reduce water pressure in smaller pressure washers ( line Loss). FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Bensaplayin

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Hose is very durable but very heavy. Wish I would have bought 2 50 foot rather than 1 100 foot.
customer_reviews.author: Pappy

customer_reviews.title: Leaks behind coupling in 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these 6 weeks ago. I use them 10hrs a month and one of the couplings is leaking behind the crimp causing water to fill up the outer liner with water making the hose bulge. 30 day change policy will not allow me to return. I'm out $100.
customer_reviews.author: jon s.

customer_reviews.title: I use professionally!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome hose! I use this hose professionally and it is an awesome hose; for me 3/8” is perfect and I would recommend this hose to anyone who is looking to start a pressure washing business or who is at the intermediate level. My hose is stored in the sun on the back of my truck on a hose reel and I have not seen any part of it deteriorate and I live in weather that gets up to 122 degrees Fahrenheit on our hottest day. Awesome Hose!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality metal hose.
customer_reviews.text: It works great for flat roof access to stucco walls from behind, porch walls, sidewalks, drive ways, when you have a long run. It is heavy to roll out and roll back up. It might be best to get a spool for this if you are not strong. Fits Generac 4200 psi sprayer connection. Drain properly before storage. Best cost compared to 2 X 75' hoses. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: 9THPSUCHIEF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Served its purpose! It's a little more hose than I expected. I suggest getting a reel if you get this much hose. But more than happy with the performance and durable feel of the hose.
customer_reviews.author: William dukes

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Hadn't had one blow out yet. It's a bit heavy to pull and fills up a hose reel, a 250 ft hose reel will be full with 200 ft of hose. Easy to order ANF if you have prime, free shipping to your door
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Extremely POOR quality, You will REGRET buying it!!
customer_reviews.text: Hose constantly wants to kink off when machine is not running and does not unkink when pressurized. You need to lay ALL 100ft of the hose out straight BEFORE starting the machine every time!!!! Steel braid under the clear cover is rusting where crimped on both ends do to poor crimps. Extremely POOR quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flexible and easy to move!
customer_reviews.text: Great pressure washer hose that stays flexible and maneuverable with time. Highly recommend purchasing this hose and throw away the junk hose that comes with most new pressure washers.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan F.

customer_reviews.title: missing adapter
customer_reviews.text: Missing adapter. The instruction show part (d), an adaptor to connent both hoses and it is missing. I had to buy of adapters to be able to connect the hoses and the pump.
customer_reviews.author: AMAXAMA

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, consider two 50 foot hoses instead.
customer_reviews.text: Great hose, but a pain to roll up, should have taken my brother-in-laws advice and ordered two 50 footers. Would have been easier to customize to my needs and clean up at the end of the day. Strongly recommend this brand the hose is very well built.
customer_reviews.author: jsm

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Hose is solid but a little too solid. Probably fine for once in awhile use by homeowner but frequently trying to wrestle this hose is tiring. Not flexible...
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: I do like that it does not leave stains when rubbed against ...
customer_reviews.text: Quick connect creaked after few months, got it replaced. In 20 months the hose popped inside the black rubber piece. Has a lot if melted spots from hitting the exhaust. I do like that it does not leave stains when rubbed against the drive way. 100ft without a reel was a mess, will try 2x 50ft now.
customer_reviews.author: lyubomir boychuk

customer_reviews.title: QC was overlooked on this one
customer_reviews.text: Very dis appointed. The hose quality is good. But the male connector wasn’t crimped and fell off. Dis appointed bought this to use but instead it is thrown in the corner
customer_reviews.author: stephanie gable

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: High quality great product for the $$$. Steel braided rubber over molded hose that looks like the $175 one at The Big Name stores
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, no complains so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The hose seems to be constructed of good quality and I expect it to last for awhile. I only use my pressure washer a few times a year, and I suspect that the hose will hold up for many years. There are hardly any other options for this style of hose, so thankfully this one exists for what I think is a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C.

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: In less than 6 months the hose burst. It is very stiff and hard to manage. The plus side it is Non Marking.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy don't last for the money
customer_reviews.text: It don't last even a year truns black at the end of the hose and then blow out you pay almost $100 for it it should last longer then that I payed less then that and had them last over two years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extension hose for pressure washer - Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Hose is very high quality and will last for years. We have a business. Strong enough to be used every day. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only a month old, three uses and it's turning black
customer_reviews.text: I'm afraid this hose is about to burst. I use it for my pressure washing business and near the end it's turning black. It shouldn't do that only after three uses. Not for this amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: Runs4Fun

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Is a good price for 100 ft hose , but is hard to work with it and to roll it if you don’t have a reel spend a little more and get a more flexible pressure washer hose
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Bust after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these hoses and while they are a good deal, 2 of them have already busted. They have about a 3 month lifespan. I would be wary of purchasing these because you’ll have to replace them very soon after.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy duty and non marking hose. In fact one of my neighbors commented that they had never seen a pressure washer hose that nice before.
customer_reviews.author: Terry J.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed. Durable, not cheap, ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Durable, not cheap, long hose—allows me to reach the chimney on the roof, and I can pressure wash the driveway without constantly moving the pressure washer. Did need an adapter for my Craftsman pressure washer, but small inconvenience for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Four

customer_reviews.title: A bit heavy but is heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. And I mean it’s heavy hose. Not easily wraps up when storing away. So a holder or wheel to store on be best due to kinking factor and hose weight.
customer_reviews.author: 1Realtor

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great hose for the money. It is stiff not flexible, but provides you have working room it is not an issue, While I did not pull it or would not to kink it, I think it would be tough to kink this hose. I like the clear tubing and the fact you can see the steel belts. Hose should be rolled up by hand when not in use; would be an effort to roll it on a reel.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F. Ricard

customer_reviews.title: Length of hose
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy to be of any use for home pressure washing.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Hose
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality extension hose for my power washer very pleased with it very easy to wrap up when finished with it
customer_reviews.author: stephen long

customer_reviews.title: Flexible
customer_reviews.text: Looks like good quality. Bigger than expected. One thing I wish the ends were flexible rotating.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer sinceinception

customer_reviews.title: Quality hose, very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacment hose for my hydrometer. Very durable and because of that it's a little tough to get on the hose reel the first time. But all upsides from there. It came with quick connections already on it. I've used it a few a few times and it out preformed my previous hose by a long shot.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: It returns 89.75!?
customer_reviews.text: Why returning this hose is not free as it says in the description? I discovered the pressure pump I had was only for 20 ft!!
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The steel rusts an blow's the hose at two years old no matter how much you use it twice in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Vader

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to get all the loop tangles out and straightn it out.
customer_reviews.text: I love simpson products they are very great at making things last. But this product alone along with other hoses they have are very hard to get around. They tangle so bad and are very difficult to straightn them out.
customer_reviews.author: Angel medina

customer_reviews.title: love it but price increase
customer_reviews.text: love it but price increase. need two more and they raised the price
customer_reviews.author: pedro

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for me
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for me. Did not reduce the pressure as far as I could tell even when I used it on roof of one story house. It is stiff and takes some time to get kinks out before each use. I lay it all out in a straight line before starting work.
customer_reviews.author: miacid

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy and very little flex
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and Very Very stiff.Sending it back and getting lighter with more flexibility.Seemed like a decent hose.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Its the same great quality hose that comes with 900.00 commercial pressure washer at lowes. Buy it and you won't regret.
customer_reviews.author: shyam atwal

customer_reviews.title: much better than the one that comes with the washer !
customer_reviews.text: it looks to be more durable than the old one .
customer_reviews.author: M H McCLINTOCK

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy 3 of them blew holes withing 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these both blew holes near end connection within 2 to 3 months got replacement did the same thing . Lost money and jobs over these pieces of substandard crap
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used this on several jobs recently.and it is holding up well. Connectors well made.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Nadolski

customer_reviews.title: Great extension hose for our power washer.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Excellent quality hose. Allows our power to washer to be used up on second floor siding while being on porch roof without having to cart the power washer up to the porch roof.
customer_reviews.author: LaxMen5Mom

customer_reviews.title: pretty stiff
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a little over a year for my pressure washing business....works great...was pretty stiff at first but gets better over time
customer_reviews.author: Faithful Pressure Washing

customer_reviews.title: Issue with incorrect coupling
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with correct coupling had to contact company. Took forever to get correct attachments. Now it works just fine. Company should include correct coupling or give choice
customer_reviews.author: R. Pryor

customer_reviews.title: Simpson products suck!!
customer_reviews.text: $150 and bursted on me after only months.Simpson products suck!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but wouldn't
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but wouldn't;t buy a 100' long one again. It's to heavy. I'd buy 2 - 50' next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great..
customer_reviews.text: I needed an extra 25', and it's hard to find a hose with the coupler on the end. Works great.........could easily get to my second story deck. Now I won't have to move the power washer as often.....pressure remained great.
customer_reviews.author: Golf Man's Wife

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all
customer_reviews.text: Not really happy with the product of this house I’ve had it since August and already blew out . It will cost me more to fix then what I payed for it ,. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Dominic C

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have been working in the professional pressure washing industry for over 15 years. These are absolutely the worst hoses I have ever delt with. They are hard to handle, they kink up, they twist up, they are heavy, and after less than a month, one of them busted.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip R.

customer_reviews.title: Move along, don’t waste your money or time!
customer_reviews.text: This may be an anti-kinking hose, but it easily twists on itself and was a pain to deal with. It took way too long to roll up because of the twisting and was too difficult to use. I returned it and would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Usener

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, use a spool on your mobile rig!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a monster! A HEAVY monster when full of water. Under pressure its very stiff, be rdy to kick it around with you're foot, alot. Will buy again in 100 years when or if it fails.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: very good price
customer_reviews.text: It is a Quality product Fittings are tight , the hose could be more flexible, but serves the purpose , very good price
customer_reviews.author: Crystal swensen

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff.
customer_reviews.text: A little too stiff but great price. And it works for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: roger

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hose. Holds up well, never leaks. Does not mark any surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: lisa hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice better then my more expensive one. It is very stiff but it should break in. A hose like this local is like 144 and up
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: 41032 3/8-Inch by 150-Foot
customer_reviews.text: Super works great keep you from having to move your Power washer all the time. Great quality hundred and 50 foot long
customer_reviews.author: d lute

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to coil.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, really difficult to coil. Makes me want to get a reel. Nice and long, heavy and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have not gotten a chance to use this item yet but exactly what I ordered. Feels great looks great can't wait till I put it to use
customer_reviews.author: R Chairs

customer_reviews.title: Ling and thick
customer_reviews.text: Good iteam but i had to return it cause was to long and thick
customer_reviews.author: Wenceslado Leal Esquivel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love the Simpson hose. The slick coated jacket makes it easy to clean and doesn't mark up driveways.
customer_reviews.author: Demetrius Simmons

customer_reviews.title: 4 months old and already busted.
customer_reviews.text: Had this product since March 2019 and it has already broke. (Hose busted).
customer_reviews.author: Craig W.

customer_reviews.title: Well made hose
customer_reviews.text: Durable and heavy hose for pressure washing. Did not have to keep moving the pressure washer with 100ft hose.Well made product not flimsy as other hoses
customer_reviews.author: Charles  Edwards Sr.

customer_reviews.title: He said it is very durable & looks like it will last for a long time
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this for his Pressure Washing business. He said it is very durable & looks like it will last for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very good hose
customer_reviews.text: Because it is so long, it can be difficult to handle without it being on a spindle.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Good Hose, strong construction and relatively easy to handle. I don't have to be concerned with dragging it around the yard or work site
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: been a great pressure washer hose for my cold water pressure washer thus far
customer_reviews.author: Dave, CenVA Solutions

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Not a commercial quality hose. I would not recommend for a cleaning contractor.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Poorly built
customer_reviews.text: Brass at the coupling broke while using the second time. Bruises heal bit no need taking a chance
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy W Little

customer_reviews.title: Has connections
customer_reviews.text: A good product that even came with the quick connects already on it!!
customer_reviews.author: Barry Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Quality Issue
customer_reviews.text: Terrible hose for the price. Super stiff and already tearing after only a month of use. Working to return it. I will never buy anything Simpson again related to hoses or accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Beaming Clean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked awesome. Better quality than the factory dewalt unit. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Powerwash the block
customer_reviews.text: Hooked up to Dewalt DXPW4240 (Dewalt branded, Simpson manufactured, Honda motored, Comet pumped, 4200 psi). Awesome machine, will last forever with proper care and maintenance. Came with 50' sister hose. Outstanding professional quality hose to harness power of professional power washer. You can get a 50 footer or for 20 bucks more get the big hundo. If you don't need all the length, use the fifty. If you need a little more than the fifty, use the hundred. Going to do charity work for the block? Connect them all and have at it. I know that extending water inlet hose length is more accepted practice instead of extending PW hose, however it isn't always practical. Awesome hose, purchase again? YES
customer_reviews.author: I tell it like it is

customer_reviews.title: well build pressure hose
customer_reviews.text: easy to unroll all fitting on the hose easy to put together good hoses for the money
customer_reviews.author: Delores Gentry

customer_reviews.title: good deal.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little stiff but will break in as I use it..good deal..
customer_reviews.author: Dan Casey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, you never have to waste time repositioning the ...
customer_reviews.text: 100' high pressure line at this price! Awesome, you never have to waste time repositioning the pressure washer!
customer_reviews.author: Ian High

customer_reviews.title: Black is back
customer_reviews.text: This hose is extremely stiff and comes unraveled as soon as you turn away from your reel. I would definitely recommend your standard black or gray hose.
customer_reviews.author: MachoBerry

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Very nice quality. The only issue is coiling it up after using it. Other than that, worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality hose
customer_reviews.text: Identical to the hose that comes with Honda simpson pressure washer
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: it keeps going and going!
customer_reviews.text: it's amazing to have 150' reach!!! I have to mount my reel because hand rolling it sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Thaddeus D. Holdinghausen

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff
customer_reviews.text: Definitely durable design just not very maneuverable. Hose is too stiff
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased the hose in March, hose blew up on ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the hose in March, hose blew up on me in September. Only got 6 months use out of it and now I need a new one. Giving it 2 stars only bc it lasted 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy power washing hose
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy power washing hose. A little difficult to circle up when done power washing for storage, but quality hose. I purchased for my Ryobi power washer. You can purchase quick attachment couplings at H.D.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: had it maybe a month and the thing is junk in my picture explains it all
customer_reviews.author: Scott Tokanel

customer_reviews.title: It seems like it will last a long time
customer_reviews.text: It's really durable and I haven't had any issues with it
customer_reviews.author: Josh Parker

customer_reviews.title: Choose another hose
customer_reviews.text: It’s like trying to roll up a freaking wire hanger. Horrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item fit perfectly and works great. Good to be back in operation.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Summers

customer_reviews.title: ONE MONTH AND LEAKING
customer_reviews.text: STARTED LEAKING RIGHT AFTER THE RETURN WINDOW CLOSED GOOD TIMING
customer_reviews.author: Frank DeMarco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: heavy duty hose and plenty heavy but when you need the reach you have it
customer_reviews.author: LPC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 of them within 6 months. No problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy/Tim Rea dba Grime Gobblers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this hose. I have not used it a lot but it appears to work just fine
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pressure hose because of the price. Being so cheap, I figured that it would not be great but I had to give it a shot. The quality of this hose is disappointing as it has already started leaking from the end connections after only a few months. The hose itself is turning black from the inside due to the metal jacket inside coming apart and water seeping out and started to do this after only a few uses. I use this hose a couple times a week which is probably more than most people, but I would say to avoid this hose unless you only use it maybe once or twice a month.
customer_reviews.author: WindowGuy

product_meta.title: SIMPSON Cleaning Monster 41030- 3/8" x 100' 4500 PSI Cold Water Replacement/Extension Hose
product_meta.description: Size:100-FootMonster hoses are made with a dual-braided construction of steel over polyester and jacketed with translucent polyurethane for high strength, durability. They are equipped with quick connect fittings for quick and easy setup 3/8” Male quick connect plug x 3/8” Female quick connect socket. Translucent polyurethane outer jacket is non-marring, abrasion resistant, and designed to fit most gas pressure washers with standard quick connections. Up to 140°F maximum temperate water, these are used as an original hose replacement or an extension of an existing hose. 90 Day limited accessory
feature_bullets: 3/8" Male quick connect plug x 3/8" Female quick connect socket
Designed to fit most gas pressure washers w/ quick connect

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars540 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
